-- Check if the external file format exists and create it if not
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat]
    WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET);
GO

-- Check if the external data source exists and create it if not
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net')
    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net]
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'abfss://new-york-taxi@nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net'
    );
GO

-- Create the CETAS (CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE AS SELECT) statement
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.combinedtaxitrip
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'combined_trips_data',
    DATA_SOURCE = [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net],
    FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
)
AS
SELECT 
    VendorID,
    pickup_datetime,
    dropoff_datetime,
    passenger_count,
    trip_distance,
    RatecodeID,
    store_and_fwd_flag,
    PULocationID,
    DOLocationID,
    payment_type,
    fare_amount,
    extra,
    mta_tax,
    tip_amount,
    tolls_amount,
    improvement_surcharge,
    total_amount,
    congestion_surcharge,
    service
FROM (
    SELECT 
        VendorID,
        lpep_pickup_datetime AS pickup_datetime,
        lpep_dropoff_datetime AS dropoff_datetime,
        passenger_count,
        trip_distance,
        RatecodeID,
        store_and_fwd_flag,
        PULocationID,
        DOLocationID,
        payment_type,
        fare_amount,
        extra,
        mta_tax,
        tip_amount,
        tolls_amount,
        improvement_surcharge,
        total_amount,
        congestion_surcharge,
        'green' AS service
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net/new-york-taxi/rides/green/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [green_result]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
        VendorID,
        tpep_pickup_datetime AS pickup_datetime,
        tpep_dropoff_datetime AS dropoff_datetime,
        passenger_count,
        trip_distance,
        RatecodeID,
        store_and_fwd_flag,
        PULocationID,
        DOLocationID,
        payment_type,
        fare_amount,
        extra,
        mta_tax,
        tip_amount,
        tolls_amount,
        improvement_surcharge,
        total_amount,
        congestion_surcharge,
        'yellow' AS service
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net/new-york-taxi/rides/yellow/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [yellow_result]
) combined_taxi_data;
GO

USE NewYorkTaxiDB;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://new-york-taxi@nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.zones (
	[locationid] bigint,
	[borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[zone] nvarchar(4000),
	[service_zone] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'rides/zone_lookups/taxi_zone_lookup.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE fact_trips
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'fact-trips',
    DATA_SOURCE = [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
)
AS
SELECT
    t.VendorID,
    t.pickup_datetime,
    t.passenger_count,
    t.trip_distance,
    t.RatecodeID,
    t.store_and_fwd_flag,
    pu.borough AS Pickup_Borough,
    pu.zone AS Pickup_Zone,
    do.borough AS Dropoff_Borough,
    do.zone AS Dropoff_Zone,
    t.payment_type,
    t.fare_amount,
    t.extra,
    t.mta_tax,
    t.tip_amount,
    t.tolls_amount,
    t.improvement_surcharge,
    t.total_amount,
    t.congestion_surcharge,
    t.service
FROM
    dbo.combinedtaxitrip AS t
LEFT JOIN dbo.zones AS pu
    ON t.PULocationID = pu.locationid
LEFT JOIN dbo.zones AS do
    ON t.DOLocationID = do.locationid;
